amendment.description: To strike the appropriations of $50,000,000 for the Maritime Loan Guarantee Program under title XI of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 456 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 456 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S4692-4694; text: CR S4692) To strike the appropriations of $50,000,000 for the Maritime Loan Guarantee Program under title XI of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 456 proposed by Senator McCain.
